Title: Campus Life on the East Side

Merrill.Body: This is Merrill College, tucked among the redwoods with scenic views of the bay. It's quiet, peaceful, and known for its focus on cultural studies.

C9.Body: This is College Nine, focused on global and international perspectives. Surrounded by modern buildings and shaded walkways, it’s a hub for cross-cultural exchange.

Cowell.Body: Cowell College, the oldest on campus, offers open lawns, ocean views, and a strong sense of community. The sun hits just right here most afternoons.

Gym.Body: The East Field House gym is where students come to sweat, lift, or relax in the pool. The surrounding area still keeps that signature UCSC forest aesthetic.

Beyond.Body: You’ve wandered beyond the familiar paths—open fields, tall grass, and the ever-present risk of ticks. Proceed only if you're ready to explore the unknown.
